text: Treehouse of Horror is the third episode in season 2 of The Simpsons. It was first shown on October 25, 1990. It is the first-ever "Treehouse of Horror" episode and has since been followed by a yearly "Treehouse of Horror" episode. This episode features three stories. The last one is the famous The Raven by Edgar Allan Poe. == Other websites == * * * Category:1990 television episodes Category:The Simpsons (season 2) episodes Treehouse of Horror
title: Treehouse of Horror (The Simpsons episode)
